page.title: 08FOOD I
page.content:
I AM NOT A VEGETARIAN.MY MAIN DIET IS CHIPS & BEANS.I DO NOT GET OVER WEIGHT BECAUSE I BURN OFF ALL MY ENERGY,WHILST PLAYING SPORT BECAUSE THERE IS NOTHING ELSE TO DO. WE GET MOST OF OUR FOOD FROM THE CITY CENTRE OR NEWPORT PAGNELL OR OLNEY.WE GET A BAKER WHO SELLS BREAD,EGGS,CAKES & SWEETS AT OUR VILLAGE, FILGRAVE.WE ALSO GET A VEGETABLE MAN AND A BUTCHER AND A MILKMAN.WE HAVE ROAST ON SUNDAYS WHICH CONSISTS OF ROAST POTATOES MEAT NORMALLY CHICKEN OR TURKEY WITH PEAS & CARROTS WITH MINT SAUCE,AND WINE WHICH MY DAD MAKES FOR HIS HOBBY.FOR XMAS WE HAVE TURKEY AND LOTS OF GOODIES WHICH WE ORDER FROM A FRIEND WHICH MY MUM WORKS WITH,WHICH CONSISTS OF WINES BISCUITS AND A LOT OF UNHEALTHY FOODS LIKE THAT.BUT WE ALL ENJOY IT.
.
